SELECT c.id as comment_id, c.post_id as comment_post_id, u.id as user_id, u.username as user_username, u.avatar_location as user_avatar_location, c.body as comment_body, c.date_created as comment_date_created FROM T_COMMENT c LEFT JOIN T_USER u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY c.date_created ASC
